summary: Anonymous chat application with inline image upload and GIF picker, no authentication required, all backend functions publicly accessible
architectural_notes: No authentication or login system - fully anonymous access
All backend canister methods publicly accessible without caller verification
Image upload and GIF picker displayed inline in chat interface

existing_features.title: Display image upload and GIF picker inline in the message input area rather than in a dropdown menu

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all Internet Identity authentication from the frontend application
Remove all caller verification checks from backend canister methods to make them publicly accessible
